20110131030138.000|20110131030139.000|CC1|YOUR SAFE.                      
20110131030139.000|20110131030140.000|CC1|WE START WITH WHAT MAY BE ONE OF
20110131030140.000|20110131030142.000|CC1|THE OLDEST SCAMS IN THE BOOK.   
20110131030142.000|20110131030144.000|CC1|ALIVE AND WELL AND TAKING       
20110131030144.000|20110131030146.000|CC1|HARD-EARNED MONEY FROM PEOPLE

20110131030713.000|20110131031029.000|SEG_01|Type=Commercial
20110131030713.000|20110131030714.000|CC1|     For three hours a week,    
20110131030714.000|20110131030715.000|CC1|          I'm a coach.          
20110131030715.000|20110131030715.000|CC1|    But when I was diagnosed    
20110131030715.000|20110131030718.000|CC1|     with prostate cancer...    
20110131030718.000|20110131030719.000|CC1|        I needed a coach.
